original:
<MSG.8.0x00>Espere um segun!<END>[0x0][0x8b]1[0x0][0x0][0x0]There should be a
Reaverbot around
there somewhere...<END>[0x0][0x8b]2[0x0][0x0][0x0]Can you see it?<END>[0x0][0x8b]3[0x0][0x0][0x0]It looks like a
small one--<END>[0x0][0x8b]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]you should be able
to take it down with
your Buster Gun.<END>[0x0][0x95][0x0]1[0xa5][0x80][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x9e][0x88][0x4c][0x0]L[0x0]?5[0x8f][0x0]8[0x85]4[0x9c]V[0x0]Instructions
